forecast.name: This Afternoon
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 66, with temperatures falling to around 64 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 18 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 6 to 14 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco this afternoon, the sun graces the skyline with a gentle warmth, the high expected to flirt with the mid-sixties. As the day unfurls, expect a subtle transition, where temperatures might dance down to around sixty-four. A pleasant breeze from the west southwest will carry whispers of movement, gently rustling the leaves and perhaps encouraging a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero or through the charming streets of North Beach. 

Tonight brings a softer tone; the clouds will settle in, wrapping the city in a cozy embrace as temperatures dip toward fifty-six. The winds will quiet down, offering a peaceful ambiance perfect for savoring a warm drink at a local café or enjoying a quiet evening at home. The marine layer may linger close to the coastline, perhaps hinting at a touch of mist by the bay, but today’s clarity suggests that most of the fog will bypass the city, rendering views of the Golden Gate Bridge inviting and picturesque. As you prepare for the day’s activities, a light jacket will suffice for the evening chill, while daytime attire should remain breathable, allowing you to enjoy the extraordinary charm of this urban oasis. Embrace the day with a sense of calm exploration, whether it be indulging in the culinary delights nearby or seeking out a hidden park to bask in the beautiful moment.
